text: Lippelo is a small town in the Belgian province of Antwerp. It is a part of the municipality of Sint-Amands. Lippelo had 1173 people as of January 1 2006. == History == Lippelo was an independent municipality until 1976. Then, it became, along with Oppuurs, part of the municipality of Sint-Amands. == Geography == Lippelo has an area of 4,14 kmÂ². == Demography == === Evolution of the population === ==== 19th century ==== Jaar 1806 1816 1830 1846 1856 1866 1876 1880 1890 Inwoneraantal 515 528 626 577 570 633 688 680 669 Remark:results from population census at 31 December ==== 20th century until 1976 ==== Jaar 1900 1910 1920 1930 1947 1961 1970 1976 Inwoneraantal 696 702 686 705 794 792 944 975 Remark:results from population census at 31 December Category:Former municipalities of Antwerp
title: Lippelo
